subject: Newsletter 📣
text:
This newsletter is being sent to you, ${player.handle}, to inform you that our official game start date is coming this Friday, December 22nd. All prior deeds will be zeroed and everyone will start off as a Novice player, regardless.
If you have not played in a while, you still have some 'dress rehearsal' time before the playing board is reset. Come join the party! And speaking of parties, if you are not a member of a gang, consider starting a new one or joining up in an open spot.

	https://robert.hurst-ri.us/games/dankdomain 

For the latest developments with 🔥 Dank Domain 🔥 

	https://www.npmjs.com/package/dankdomain 

Happy hunting!
